statements: DELETE FROM crop_data WHERE yield_kg > 1000 AND sale_price < 10.00;
DELETE FROM crop_yields WHERE yield_amount < 1000 AND crop_name = 'Wheat';
DELETE FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 5000 AND sale_date = '2022-10-15';
DELETE FROM crop_yield_data WHERE crop_id = 1 AND yield_kg > 5000
DELETE FROM crop_sales WHERE sale_date < '2023-01-01' AND total_amount > 10000
DELETE FROM YieldData WHERE crop_name = 'Tomato' AND yield_amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM RevenueData WHERE month_year = '2022-05-01' AND revenue < 50000.00;
DELETE FROM crop_yield_data WHERE crop_name='Corn' AND yield_amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM financial_analysis WHERE total_yield_amount < 50000 OR profit_amount < 10000;
